survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding electric vehicle (EV) charging stations, including usage patterns, accessibility, and desired features.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to capture frequency of usage. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for SINGLE_CHOICE type.

script.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify top priorities. Limit to 3 selections to force prioritization.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for MULTI_CHOICE type with a maximum selection of 3.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Show to all respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for SINGLE_CHOICE type.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Show to all respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for OPEN_TEXT type.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which payment methods do you prefer for using EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: Show to all respondents who did not select 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to understand payment preferences. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for MULTI_CHOICE type with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which payment methods do you prefer for using EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: Show to all respondents who did not select 'Never' in Q1.
